string.value: Operation Strategy 1 : Collect All the Eggs
#b#p2041026##k in the #b#m220000000# Clocktower basement#k has proposed to begin a Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation. What does he mean by that? Let's go find #p2041026#.

The Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation has begun. #p2041026# asks you to bring back #b#o4230113##k, #b#o3230306##k, and #b#t4031991##k... It seems he wants to exterminate all the eggs first. Alright, whatever he wants!
He says you can find other eggs by hunting #rTick, Tick-Tock, or Chronos type monsters#k, but #b#o5220003s# have a tendency to hatch their eggs in another bird's nest#k, so their eggs would be amongst eggs of other birds. It seems you have to crack other eggs to find it and take it over to #t4031991#. 

#i2022354##t2022354# #b#c2022354#/10#k 
#i2022355##t2022355# #b#c2022355#/10#k 
#i4031991##t4031991# #b#c4031991#/10#k
You have found all the eggs and gave them to #p2041026#. Ghosthunter Bob seems satisfied and suggest you engage in the operation.

#b#m220000000#Castle Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation#k! ...has begun. It may be a bit of a chore, but what can you do? Fortunately, you probably won't have to hunt any powerful monsters yet since it's still in the beginning stages of the operation. I'm saying, you can easily do it. What do you say? Do you want to try?

Operation strategy 1 is to collect all the eggs! Simply put, you just have to find #b#o4230113##k, #b#o3230306##k, and #b#t4031991##k from the upper level and collect #b10 each#k. You'll be able to find them if you hunt #rTicks, Tick-Tocks, and all Chronos#k. But I must warn you, #o5220003# will be a little tricky.

#b#o5220003#s have a tendency of hatching eggs in another bird's nest.#k So you can't collect any eggs no matter how many #o5220003#s you hunt. You can probably find #t4031991# amongst the eggs of #o4230113# and Chronos.

If you find an egg that seems different from the eggs of #o4230113# and those of Chronos, try cracking it open. #t4031991# will be mixed in there somewhere with other eggs. You'll complete the operation strategy one when you bring #o4230113#, Chronos, and #t4031991#. Good luck.
Hm, well... if it's too much for you, then I suppose there isn't anything I can do. Shall we call our members? But they won't even respond to the call saying they're busy... hmmmph.
Oh, you've collected all the eggs. I'm impressed! You've successfully completed the operation strategy 1! Shall we officially begin the operation?
Let me know when you're ready to go on to the next phase of the operation.

It doesn't seem like you've collected all the eggs. They're #b#t2022354##k, #b#t2022355##k, and #b#t4031991##k. You can get them from the monsters except #t4031991#. You can only distinguish it apart by cracking other eggs.
